settings.name: Gerard
settings.content: Ordered my item on Thursday, wearing it on Friday. Excellent delivery and online service . Highly recommend Boles

settings.name: Kathy
settings.content: Excellent customer service, nothing was an problem for Mervyn, even sent photo of items not online so that I had full choice of items available (mens pj's). 5 star recommendation.

settings.name: Roisin
settings.content: Great customer service, I spotted a jumper on facebook and called to get some more information. Someone talked me through the size options and directed me to the website to purchase.

settings.name: Margeurita
settings.content: Excellent customer service, friendly, helpful staff and very professional. I had to return my dress for a different size and they made me feel like it was no problem whatsoever.

settings.name: Marie L
settings.content: I had to return an item recently and I was treated very well and another item was sourced for me and sent out by post with a lovely letter. Very nice, sincere and genuine business to deal with.

settings.name: Michael
settings.content: Got exactly what I ordered with very quick delivery. Delighted I ordered from Boles of Boyle

settings.name: Ann Keightley
settings.content:
Excellent service
I was delighted with my purchase . Delivery was fast, Items were crease free and nicely packaged.

The little sweet treats that were included was a very nice touch.

I will certainly buy from them again

receive timely updates from your favorite products.
